articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Brazilian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Brazilian Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Sergio Rubens De Araujo Torres, national president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, on April 8.
					 The message said that April 15, 2013 marks the 101st birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, President of the DPRK.
					
					 We remember Kim Il Sung, the great leader who led the struggle against the Japanese imperialist aggressors to victory, the father of socialist Korea and eternal President of the DPRK, for his warm patriotic spirit, love for people and dedication to mankind, the message noted, adding: Kim Il Sung will always be with all Korean people and world people.
					
					 We remember the feats he performed for the independence of the country and they are of special importance at this time as difficult as the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War fought against the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 All the members of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil are joining the DPRK in celebrating this significant day and extend congratulations to Kim Jong Un who inherited the grit and the cause of just struggle of Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We congratulate you on the 101st birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung and hope the Korean people would resolutely shatter the vicious war moves of the U.S. imperialists against socialist Korea.
					
					 We are convinced that the Workers' Party of Korea will defeat the U.S. imperialists present in south Korea, defend peace on the Korean Peninsula and reunify the country by dint of Songun.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Blasts S. Korea for Cyber-attack on DPRK's Websites
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Blasts S. Korea for Cyber-attack on DPRK's Websites
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released information bulletin No. 1032 Saturday. It said:
					 Several internet websites of the DPRK including "By our nation itself" came under another round of cyber-attack recently.
					
					 This is intolerable as it is a wanton violation of the DPRK's legitimate internet activities recognized by international law.
					
					 Matter is that the Intelligence Service and other forces of south Korea have their tentacles stretched deep into such provocative acts against the DPRK.
					
					 The hackers attacked the DPRK's internet websites in the lead-up to the Day of the Sun, the greatest holiday of the nation, and made invectives packaged in confrontational languages as same as those uttered by the puppet regime such as "threats from the north", "dismantlement of nuclear program" and "strengthening of security law".
					
					 No sooner had the criminals opened to public the list of subscribers for "By our nation itself" than the puppet regime is kicking up the whirlwind of wholesale suppression of progressive organizations and figures on "the list," branding them as "north's spies" and "those following the north". This proves that the puppet regime is the very one behind the cyber-attack.
					
					 The puppet group is stepping up the anti-DPRK smear campaign even with the involvement of international hackers' group. This is a despicable last ditch effort of those who have been taken aback by the DPRK making steady victorious progress, demonstrating the might of Songun.
					
					 Those who pursue injustice dislike bright light.
					
					 The puppet regime has chosen the internet websites as a means for stoking confrontation with the DPRK in a bid to weaken the influences of the DPRK's internet websites which impart the news of the DPRK, independent and just, to the world, and stamp out pro-reunification and patriotic forces through the farce against "those following the north".
					
					 The more the puppet regime resorts to the sordid anti-DPRK smear campaign, the more glaringly it will disclose its nature as a group of despicable and mean criminals. The regime will get only merciless retaliation and bitter end.
					
					 However desperately the puppet regime may try, it can never tarnish the image of the DPRK dignified with independence and shining with Songun. 
					
					 The group of dirty traitors standing against justice and challenging truth will never be able to evade a miserable end.

articles.title: S. Korean Chongwadae "Security Room" Chief's Belligerent Remarks Blasted: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
S. Korean Chongwadae "Security Room" Chief's Belligerent Remarks Blasted: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jang Su, chief of the security office of puppet Chongwadae of south Korea, again made provocative remarks against the DPRK.
					 Kim, who formerly served the puppet military, in a report delivered at the parliamentary operation committee on April 18 said that "there is no sign of an all-out war which the north threatened and the north has no ability to fight it."
					
					 He even blustered that south Korea would "respond with every possible means with targets set at provocation base and supporting and commanding forces" to cope with the north's "local provocation" which arouses concerns.
					
					 Like a puppy unafraid of a tiger, the guy who held the post of puppet minister under the rat-like Lee Myung Bak regime made a bluff, counting on his current position in Chongwadae.
					
					 It all the more matters as his remarks have something in common with the recent words uttered by puppet Defense Minister Kim Kwan Jin.
					
					 Their vituperation is extremely dangerous and provocative invectives aimed to escalate the tension on the Korean Peninsula and start an all-out war at any cost.
					
					 In light of the post of Kim Jang Su, allegedly in charge of "security" affairs in Chongwadae, his remarks reflect the stand of the present south Korean regime and the substantial possibility of military provocation. This can never be overlooked.
					
					 Their remarks give the lie to the recent "dialogue" proposal offered by the present south Korean regime.
					
					 As had already been declared, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK are waiting for a final order, maintaining combat and mobilized posture to deal strong retaliatory blows at the enemies if they make even a slightest movement of provocation.
					
					 The DPRK's all-out physical strike will destroy all the military bases in south Korea which house military gangsters like Kim Jang Su and other provokers.
					
					 Kim Jang Su who has no idea of what a real war is like extremely got on the nerves of the DPRK with such rhetoric as "no sign of an all-out war" and "no ability" only to prove that he hopes for a total war with the DPRK.
					
					 Now that the puppet military gangsters stand for an all-out war, time will come earlier for the DPRK's physical strike.
					
					 We warn that the warmongers' wild act at Chongwadae may entail an unpredictable disaster.
					
					 The provokers will be made to drink a bitter cup for wagging their short tongue in a wrong way.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Refutes Misinformation Spread by Dishonest Forces
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Refutes Misinformation Spread by Dishonest Forces
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. internet newspaper World Net Daily speaking for U.S. conservative forces recently released a false story linking the bomb explosion during the Boston Marathon to the DPRK. It reported the misinformation that the DPRK used such an agent as Al Qaeda for attacking the U.S.
					 The DPRK categorically dismisses this anti-DPRK ruckus made by the conservative daily bereft of any elementary appearance as a medium as a false propaganda which does not deserve even a passing note.
					
					 Its act of charging the DPRK with bomb explosion in Boston by deliberately linking it to Al Qaeda is part of the hostile forces' sinister plots to tarnish its international prestige out of their inveterate repugnance towards it.
					
					 The U.S. conservative forces seek to re-list the DPRK on the "sponsor of terrorism" and take it as a target of "anti-terror war" as it did in Iraq and Afghanistan.
					
					 The DPRK would like to stress once again that it has no touch with Al Qaeda and has consistently maintained the stand of opposing all forms of terrorism by acceding to international conventions against terrorism. 
					
					 When the DPRK feels necessary to strike the U.S., it would not resort to such heinous terrorism in hiding.
					
					 The U.S. conservative forces should have felt ashamed of its behavior to tarnish the image of the DPRK, a full-fledged nuclear weapons state, through such mean practice.

articles.title: Who Benefits from Tension on Korean Peninsula: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Who Benefits from Tension on Korean Peninsula: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korea stated in public of their intentions to bring the situation on the Korean Peninsula under control by a diplomatic way amid the tension running high on the peninsula.
					 It will be very much satisfying if they took a politically bold decision for peace after admitting their responsibility for escalating tension on the peninsula.
					
					 The international community is skeptical about it.
					
					 The U.S. policy of directing focus on the Asia-Pacific region does not require the detente of tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is now trying to give impression that it stands for restraining military actions and holding dialogue on the peninsula, a trick to deflect the attention of the international public opinion.
					
					 The tension rising on the peninsula favors the U.S. foreign policy for converting the political and military atmosphere in the Asia-Pacific region, strategic vantage area in the 21st century, absolutely favorable for it.
					
					 In other words, tension escalating on the peninsula under the simulated conditions of "contingency" is the most favorable for the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. and other hostile forces loudly assert that the escalating tensions help the DPRK get such political "gains" as "rallying of ranks". This is totally illogical.
					
					 It is the Korean nation which suffers most from the tension running high on the peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK's socialist construction with its ultimate goal for improving the standard of people's living and building a thriving nation has faced hurdles and Koreans have substantially been exposed to trials and hardships due to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. case is quite contrary to this.
					
					 Lately the U.S. massively introduced all kinds of ultra-modern military hardware under the pretext of coping with the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula. This has brought the U.S. great benefits of drastically beefing military deployment, pursuant to its strategy of directing focus on the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The U.S. sent strategic nuclear submarines, one of three strategic nuclear attack means, to waters off the Korean Peninsula and flied strategic bombers to the sky above the peninsula for nuclear bombing drills.
					
					 Still it is staging nuclear war exercises targeting the DPRK and sending nuclear carrier task force to operational waters off the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. regards the present tensest situation as an opportunity for containing big powers in the Asia-Pacific region and intensifying stifling offensive against the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean Peninsula is a key link in the whole chain of the U.S. strategy for putting the Asia-Pacific under its control.
					
					 The U.S. stand is that "basic in the U.S. foreign policy in the 21st century is its policy to Asia, the Korean Peninsula being its main focus" and that "unless it has grip on the peninsula, it can not guarantee its absolute interests in Northeast Asia nor can it establish new international order and guarantee its dominating position and role."
					
					 That's why the U.S. is making hasty moves. It seeks to take the initiatives in the region and thus realize its world domination strategy in the new century. It cancelled the deployment of fourth-phase missile defence system in Europe under the pretext of coping with possible "missile attack" from the DPRK and decided to deploy 14 interceptor missiles in Alaska and the second radar in Japan and push forward redeployment of the missile defence system for building the third tunnel-type interceptor missile base in its mainland. By doing so, it has stepped up the preparations for rendering the strategic armed forces of big powers ineffective.
					
					 The U.S. forces stationed on Guam, at Darwin Port and in Diego Garcia base have secured a relatively stable strategic stronghold and monitored the development of situation in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The U.S. has pushed forward the preparations for forming NATO of Asian version by drawing Japan and south Korea deep into its "security umbrella."
					
					 It also plans introducing task force from the U.S. mainland to the Korean Peninsula in case of contingency on it with Japan as a departure base.
					
					 In the past the U.S. used Okinawa Island as major U.S. miliary base. Now it has converted the whole Japanese Islands into a strategic vantage point for a preemptive attack.
					
					 To cope with the situation geared for the outbreak of a war on the Korean Peninsula, the U.S. navy set six Japanese ports as major ports namely Kagoshima, Nagasaki, Hakata, Shimonoseki, Niigata, Akita.
					
					 The U.S. arms and equipment in the region have been bulked up to the maximum level, far beyond that in Europe and Mideast.
					
					 The ultimate goal of Foal Eagle joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. is to test in the peninsula all elements for realizing its strategy for domination of the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The war atmosphere that has been fanned up and persisted on the peninsula stemmed from the U.S. foreign and political purposes.
					
					 The world's biggest possessor of nukes U.S. is waging nuclear strike drill against the DPRK. The latter, also a nuclear weapons state, is thus compelled not to remain an onlooker to it.
					
					 No one can vouch that exchange of fire will not spill over into an actual war.
					
					 Will the U.S. be able to have a complacent smile of satisfaction at that time?

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Work Marked
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday dedicates a by-lined article to the first anniversary of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People".
					 The work, published on the occasion of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, comprehensively deals with his great revolutionary life, noble personality as a great man and immortal feats. 
					
					 The work clearly indicates the revolutionary feats general secretary Kim Jong Il performed by firmly defending the idea and cause of the President and wisely leading the struggle to materialize them and the tasks to be fulfilled to hold the President and Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever and victoriously advance the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's work serves as an immortal library that comprehensively clarifies the greatness of the President as the most outstanding leader in the 20th century and peerlessly great man, and an encyclopedia dealing with the immortal feats of the President who provided an eternal cornerstone for victoriously advancing and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, the article says, adding:
					
					 The work also serves as a victorious banner that indicates the way of eternally glorifying the immortal feats of Kim Jong Il, who added shine to the century of Juche Korea, holding the President in high esteem as the sun of Juche, and Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are faced with a sacred and honorable task to adorn another century of Juche Korea with victory and glory under the uplifted banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, holding the great Generalissimos in high esteem, the article notes. 
					
					 It calls on all Koreans to regard the ideas and theories clarified by Kim Jong Un in his work as precious guidelines and invariably advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism taken by the President and Kim Jong Il all their lives, no matter how much water may flow under the bridge and how many difficulties they may face, and thus build a thriving nation of Juche on this land without fail.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing WPK's New Line
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing WPK's New Line 
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea laid down a strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and building of nuclear force. This new line serves as a treasured sword for bringing earlier the building of a thriving socialist nation and national reunification and a banner for protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the nation generation after generation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 This line reflects the unshakable will of the dear respected Kim Jong Un to bolster up the nuclear force for self-defence so as to guarantee the security and prosperity of the nation and build on this land the best nation admired by the world.
					
					 The nuclear force of the DPRK serves as a just treasured sword for protecting the nation from the daily escalating U.S. nuclear blackmail and its threat of aggression and a reliable shield for defending peace on the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia and ensuring eternal prosperity of a reunified country, the article notes. It is a lifeline of the nation and national treasure of reunified Korea that can never be bartered for anything. 
					
					 Diversified smaller and lighter nuclear force of the DPRK is reliable war deterrence capable of protecting the nation from the U.S. nuclear disaster, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 For the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear force both in quality and quantity is a quite just step to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation with the U.S. watching for a chance to ignite a war of aggression while posing a constant nuclear threat to the DPRK.
					
					 Not only the history of national division but the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula clearly proves that powerful nuclear force alone can protect peace and achieve independent development and prosperity of the nation.
					
					 But for the powerful nuclear deterrence of the DPRK, a nuclear war would have already broken out a hundred times.
					
					 The military and technical superiority is no longer monopoly of the imperialists. Gone are the days never to return when they could threaten and blackmail the DPRK with A-bombs.
					
					 The DPRK's nukes are precious treasure common to the nation as they guarantee the eternal prosperity of a reunified country.

articles.title: There Will Be No DPRK-U.S. Talks on Denuclearization: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
There Will Be No DPRK-U.S. Talks on Denuclearization: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is now talking about "dialogue" with the DPRK, putting up the latter's step for denuclearization as a precondition for dialogue. High-ranking U.S. officials let loose a spate of rhetoric that President Obama ordered to cancel some military drills, contributing to detente, the DPRK should be sincere in the efforts for realizing denuclearization and dialogue is possible only when it opts for denuclearization.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					 This is nothing but rhetoric prompted by the U.S. crafty ploy to shift the blame for the tension on the Korean Peninsula on to the DPRK and put international pressure on it.
					
					 The U.S. should not think about the denuclearization on the peninsula before the world is denuclearized.
					
					 It is nuclear weapons which the U.S. regards as the only means for containing its regional rivals and establishing its military domination. By taking advantage of its nuclear edge it seeks to browbeat its rivals to make them obedient to it and attain its hegemonic purposes. Its main target is the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Its scenario is to put the Korean Peninsula under its military control and establish its control over the Eurasian Continent, using it as a base. 
					
					 What matters is that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK will remain unchanged.
					
					 The U.S. policy of threatening the DPRK with nukes will also remain unchanged unless the U.S. abandons its ambition to dominate the world.
					
					 The above-said precondition raised by the U.S. for dialogue goes to fully prove that the U.S. harbors an ulterior intention to force the DPRK to dismantle its nukes and then put it under the U.S. military control.
					
					 The DPRK's stand is clear. The U.S. should not think about the denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula before the world is denuclearized. There may be talks between the DPRK and the U.S. for disarmament but no talks on denuclearization.

articles.title: Minju Joson Assails S. Korean Puppets' Reckless War Strategy
articles.content:
Minju Joson Assails S. Korean Puppets' Reckless War Strategy
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Recently the south Korean warmongers worked out a "strategy for making havoc of the north Korean army". It was designed to reduce the military forces of the DPRK to ashes by mounting a preemptive missile strike upon them in "case of contingency" on the Korean Peninsula.
					 Minju Joson Saturday in a bylined commentary observes in this regard:
					
					 This war strategy brought into bolder relief the true colors of the south Korea puppets seeking to ignite a war by making a preemptive missile strike upon the DPRK.
					
					 In actuality, the south Korean puppet military is scheming to apply the above-said strategy to OPLAN 5015, a new war scenario targeting the DPRK, while making desperate efforts to introduce long-range air-to-surface missiles capable of striking the whole part of the DPRK from the area south of the Military Demarcation Line.
					
					 OPLAN 5015 is a combination of OPLAN 5026 the keynote of which is to mount a preemptive nuclear strike upon the DPRK and OPLAN 5027 the main contents of which are to deploy the U.S. "rapid deterrent forces" on the Korean Peninsula, destroy the "strategic targets in the north", land huge troops on the coast of the DPRK, "occupy it by force" and set up a "ruling machinery of occupation" in it. Accordingly, OPLAN 5015 is aimed to let the U.S. forces in south Korea and the puppet army deal a "preemptive strike" at the DPRK and occupy Pyongyang in a short time without any reinforcement from the U.S. mainland. The puppet forces are mulling adding the "strategy for making havoc of the north Korean army" to such dangerous OPLAN 5015. This is tantamount to an open declaration of war against the DPRK.
					
					 Despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK and strong protest and condemnation at home and abroad, the south Korean warmongers went the lengths of making public the "strategy for making havoc of the north Korean army".
					
					 This goes to clearly prove the absurdity of the story of "threat from the north" and "provocation by it" always talked about by the puppets in south Korea. 
					
					 The warmongers will get merciless punishment for their absurd strategy.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Nigeria Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Nigeria Appointed
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Jong Yong Chol was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Nigeria, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Players Prove Successful at Asian Judo Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Players Prove Successful at Asian Judo Championship
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK judoist Hong Kuk Hyon placed first in men's 73kg category at the 2013 Asian Judo Championship now under way in Bangkok.
					 He defeated his Chinese, Turkmenistan and south Korean rivals in the preliminary matches, his rival of Taipei, China in the semi-finals and his Mongolian rival in the finals, bagging a gold medal.
					
					 DPRK players Kim Sol Mi and Kim Su Gyong finished the runner-up in women's 48kg and 63 kg categories respectively.
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK wrestler Yun Won Chol placed third in the greco-roman 55kg category at the 2013 Asian Wrestling Championship held in New Delhi on April 18.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit DPRK's Missions to Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit DPRK's Missions to Mark Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Personages of foreign countries and regional bodies visited DPRK's missions in their countries from Mar. 28 to April 15 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the first anniversaries of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's election to the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state.
					 They placed floral baskets and bunches of flowers before portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il and their full-length paintings.
					
					 They included figures of the Ministry of Royal Palace of the Cambodian government, Khabarovsk Territorial Committee and Khabarovsk City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), Nepal-Korea Friendship Association, Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics, Nepalese national committee to celebrate the assumption of posts as top leader of the revolution of Korea and the world by the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is an honorary member of the National Press Club of Nepal, International Committee for the Study of Songun Politics for Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Nepal, Nepali Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Politics, Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal, Nepal Women's Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics, Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Committee of Nepal, Kuwaiti preparatory committee to mark the Day of the
					
					  Sun, Hungarian Communist Workers' Party, Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), Belgian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association, Slovenia-DPRK Friendship Association, Uzbekistan-DPRK Friendship Forum, Nigerian national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, Beijing Xinwei Telecom Enterprise Group and the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace of Cambodia who headed the delegation of the Ministry of Royal Palace of the Cambodian government, said that the long-standing friendship between Cambodia and the DPRK provided by Great King Norodom Sihanouk and President Kim Il Sung would grow stronger in the future.
					
					 Igor Jurisic, chairman of the Slovenia-DPRK Friendship Association, noted: Though the President passed away, his great image will always be in our hearts.
					
					 Eldar Rasulov, chairman of Uzbekistan-DPRK Friendship Forum, said that the struggle of the Korean people is just, expressing his conviction of their victory.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Observe Founding Anniversary of KPA
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Observe Founding Anniversary of KPA
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- A meeting of foreign crewmen was held in Hungnam Port, South Hamgyong Province Saturday on the occasion of the 81st anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Its participants laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il in Hamhung City before paying tribute to them.
					
					 Present at the meeting were the captain and crewmen of a Cambodian-flagged ship.
					
					 Speakers extended highest respect to the President and Kim Jong Il, founder and builder of the KPA, who represent an ever-victorious banner. 
					
					 The KPA has won victory under the wise commandership of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, they noted, adding: 
					
					 The KPA is equipped with powerful offensive and defensive means capable of waging any modern war. 
					
					 As the Korean people hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem as another great brilliant Songun commander, the DPRK is demonstrating its dignity before the world as an invincible politico-ideological power, world-class military power, a nuclear weapons state and a satellite manufacturer and launcher.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the service personnel and people of the DPRK who are stepping up the building of a thriving socialist nation, closely united around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: DPRK Players Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Players Back Home
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK players came back home on Saturday.
					 They proved successful in preliminary match of Group H for the 2014 U-14 AFC Soccer Championship in league matches held in Hong Kong, China.

articles.title: National Reunification in Sprit of April 19 Uprising Called for
articles.content:
National Reunification in Sprit of April 19 Uprising Called for
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Organizations of south Korea, including the Society of April Revolution, the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Youth Solidarity, held a meeting on Thursday to mark the 53rd anniversary of the April 19 Popular Uprising.
					 The organizations said that the spirit of the uprising for independence, democracy and reunification is alive in the hearts of people along with the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The conservative ruling forces are working hard to tide over the danger of war through the policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen and security rule, the organizations noted, adding the people will never pardon them.
					
					 The war crisis that looms on the peninsula at present makes one keenly feel how precious independence, democracy and reunification are, they said, calling for achieving peace and independent reunification in the spirit of the April 19 uprising.
					
					 They said they would take the lead in the actions to remove the escalating threats of a nuclear war from the Korean Peninsula and bring peace by implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Int'l Organization Marks Day of Sun
articles.content:
Int'l Organization Marks Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- An event for marking the 101st birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was held at the building of the Organization of Solidarity of the People of Africa, Asia and Latin America on April 16.
					 Present there were members of the organization including the director of its Political Department, and DPRK Ambassador to Cuba Jon Yong Jin and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portrait of the smiling President before paying tribute to him.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Mark Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia and the United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine held celebrations of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Vice-Chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia An Hyang Jin and his party visited the DPRK embassy in Moscow on April 15 to lay bouquets before a full-length painting of Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il standing together and pay tribute to them.
					
					 The United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine held a meeting in Kiev on April 14.
					
					 Present there were Chairman of the confederation Kim Yong Sul and its members and Koreans in Ukraine.
					
					 The participants paid highest tribute to the President, representing ardent yearning and profound reverence for him.
					
					 Kim Yong Sul in his speech praised the President for performing immortal feats on behalf of the country and its people, era and history.

articles.title: South Headquarters of Pomminryon Calls for Staging Dynamic March for Reunification
articles.content:
South Headquarters of Pomminryon Calls for Staging Dynamic March for Reunification 
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued a statement on Thursday to mark the 65th anniversary of the April Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Public Organizations in North and South Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The joint conference held in Pyongyang in April 1948 was a nation-wide great action for reunification which declared before the whole world that the only way out for the Korean nation is to oppose the separatists'  "separate elections and separate government", make the foreign troops pull out of south Korea and set up an independent and reunified state.
					
					 The spirit of the joint conference is enshrined in the spirit of the great national unity clarified in the July 4 south-north joint statement and the spirit of "By our nation itself".
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula has reached the worst phase of a war since the June 25 Korean War owing to the U.S.-masterminded UN "resolution on sanctions" against the north over its  satellite launch for peaceful purposes and the nuclear war drills which lasted for two months.
					
					 In other development, the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are busy with a hypocritical dialogue offensive, putting forth the north's denuclearization as a precondition. 
					
					 If they truly want dialogue with the north, they should, first of all, stop nuclear war drills and rescind the UN "resolutions on sanctions" and hostile policy.
					
					 The statement underline the need to stage actions to the last to foil the war moves of the U.S. and the anti-reunification forces and force the U.S. troops out of this land this year marking the 60th anniversary of the conclusion of the Armistice Agreement.
					
					  It called for frustrating the anti-reunification forces' moves to perpetuate the division of the nation and staging a dynamic nation-wide grand march for reunification under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime Accused of Hurting Dignity of Supreme Leadership of the DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime Accused of Hurting Dignity of Supreme Leadership of the DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration issued a statement Saturday slamming the south Korean puppet regime for misleading public opinion after hurling gangsters into such thrice-cursed act as daring hurt again the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 The regime brought together such human scum as elders more dead than alive and reckless villains for an anti-DPRK meeting in downtown Seoul in broad daylight to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 This shuddering hideous provocation staged at a time when the situation is inching close to the brink of a war has driven the inter-Korean relations into an unpredictable dangerous phase.
					
					 What matters is that the south Korean puppet regime is playing a petty trick to mislead the public opinion in a foolish attempt to evade the responsibility for the prevailing grave situation.
					
					 Even a mere child knows the fact that the contents of small literature used not only at a meeting held by a few people but at a rally taking place in south Korea under the reign of fascism and dictatorship should get a prior strict permission by the puppet authorities.
					
					 The recent serious provocation was not an accidental racket kicked up by a few hooligans but part of the premeditated anti-DPRK confrontation campaign staged under the scenario carefully worked out by the authorities including the puppet military gangsters.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the puppet authorities were the arch criminal who orchestrated the provocation. 
					
					 The North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration vehemently denounces in the name of all Koreans the group of traitors for its thrice-cursed confrontation racket, branding it as a deliberate and premeditated provocation to incite extreme enmity toward compatriots and push the situation to the brink of a war.
					
					 It is the final conclusion made by all the compatriots desirous of peace and reunification that no talking to the confrontation and war maniacs would help solve anything and the only solution is to make a clean sweep of them.
					
					 The puppet group will come to bitterly experience what disastrous consequences will be entailed by its foolish act of beating the air.

articles.title: Retraction of S. Korea's Decision to Introduce U.S. Helicopter Called for
articles.content:
Retraction of S. Korea's Decision to Introduce U.S. Helicopter Called for
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held a press conference outside the puppet Defense Ministry on April 18 at which it denounced the military authorities scheme to introduce American Apache.
					 It said that the ministry designated U.S. AH-64E as a prototype of large-scale attack helicopter.
					
					 This helps the U.S. benefit from arms deal by spending money collected as taxes from people, it charged.
					
					 It demanded the military authorities immediately rescind the above-said decision which raises a lot of problems in military and economic aspects.

articles.title: Just Cause of Korean People Supported at Int'l Women's Meeting
articles.content:
Just Cause of Korean People Supported at Int'l Women's Meeting 
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The meeting of the Executive Committee of the Women's International Democratic Federation expressed support and solidarity for the just cause of the Korean people. It took place in Cyprus from April 3 to 7.
					 Marcia de Campos Pereira, president of the federation, said in a report at the meeting that although the DPRK is not large in its territory, it is a great country and its people are a staunch people who have struggled against the U.S. moves to stifle it for many years.
					
					 The president recalled that due to the moves of the U.S. and its followers, there is the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula and the government of the DPRK is standing firm against it.
					
					  She hoped that the DPRK would register greater success in the work to increase the role of the women in every fabric of social life including the anti-imperialist struggle and economic construction.
					
					 The final resolution of the meeting urged the U.S. to halt at once its moves to stifle the DPRK in collusion with its allies and withdraw its aggressor forces including nukes from south Korea.
					
					 The meeting adopted a statement of solidarity "The U.S. should roll back at once its hostile policy towards the DPRK and ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula".
					
					 The statement demanded the U.S. accept the just proposals of the DPRK calling on the U.S. to rescind its hostile policy toward the DPRK at once and replace the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty.
					
					 It also urged the U.S. to comply with the unanimous will and wish of the Korean people and other world progressive peoples for lasting peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 In the meantime, there took place in a city on April 5 an event to support the struggle of the Korean people.
					
					 The president and delegates of women's bodies from different countries looked round photos on the theme of "Successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2" and watched Korean films such as "The DPRK that the World Witnessed in 2012" and "E-library of Kim Il Sung University".

articles.title: Russian Mayor Refers to Russia-DPRK Friendship
articles.content:
Russian Mayor Refers to Russia-DPRK Friendship
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The Russia-Korea Children's Friendship Association Named after Kim Jong Il is a symbol of the Russia-DPRK friendship, says A. N. Sokolov, mayor of Khabarovsk City, at a ceremony for displaying portraits of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il and a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un held on April 9.
					 Looking back on the day the association was inaugurated at 11th Middle School in Khabarovsk City, he hoped that the friendly relations between the children and peoples of the two countries would grow strong through the association.
					
					 Lyudmila Lebkova, principal of the school, said: The teachers and students of the school are greatly pleased to see the portraits of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as well as the photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un hung on a wall of the classroom of the school splendidly renovated on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung).
					
					 We decided to present a letter to Kim Jong Un, who is successfully carrying forward the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two peoples provided by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, reflecting the profound reverence of the teachers and students.
					
					 I will strive hard to boost the Russia-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations.

articles.title: Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Peru
articles.content:
Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Peru
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- A meeting for solidarity with the Korean people took place in Lima, Peru on April 10.
					 Present there were officials of political parties, organizations and institutions of Peru and citizens.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting. 
					
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, said that the Korean people would shatter the war moves of the U.S. imperialists and their stooges through their heroic struggle and certainly win victory in the all-out action against the U.S. by dint of the self-defensive capabilities bolstered up by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and under the Songun leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The international secretary of the C.C., the Peruvian Communist Party noted that the might of the DPRK is growing stronger as the Songun cause is being steadfastly carried forward by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Peruvian committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il said: The U.S. should behave with discretion, well aware of the situation and might of the DPRK. The UN and the international community should take decisive measures, clearly mindful that the cause of the danger of a war on the Korean Peninsula is the U.S. and its stooges' moves for aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 Yuri Castro Romero, secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, urged the U.S. to ponder over the fact that it would suffer from all disasters to be entailed from the moment it ignites a war.
					
					 The meeting adopted an appeal which denounced the U.S. and its followers for their moves to ignite a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The appeal urged the UN Security Council to immediately rescind all "resolutions on sanctions" unreasonably faked up with the aim to encroach upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Guy Dupre, secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea, issued a statement on April 12 as regards the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the U.S. imperialists' moves for a new war.
					 The situation on the peninsula is getting so strained day by day due to the joint military exercises of the U.S. and south Korean belligerent forces that it has inched close to the outbreak of war, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK clarified its stand to defend its sovereignty and dignity with its powerful nuclear deterrent to cope with the U.S. imperialists and their allies' ever-escalating military threats and unreasonable sanctions. It also took steps for self-defence to shatter the U.S. moves for aggression.
					
					 The international liaison committee makes it clear to all progressive forces and peace-loving forces of the world that it is none other than the U.S. which aggravates the situation on the peninsula.
					
					 It denounces the new war moves of the U.S. and its allies against the Korean people and calls for voicing solidarity for their just cause to protect peace and security on the peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report Carried by Kuwaiti Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report Carried by Kuwaiti Paper
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- The full text of the report made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was carried by the Kuwaiti paper Al Anba on April 11.
					 The report sets forth a new strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and building of nuclear force as required by the prevailing situation and the developing revolution.

articles.title: Portraits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il, Photo of Kim Jong Un Displayed at Russian School
articles.content:
Portraits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il, Photo of Kim Jong Un Displayed at Russian School
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of displaying portraits of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il and a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un was held at 11th Middle School in Khabarovsk City, Russia on April 9 to mark the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung. 
					 The portraits and photo were hung on a wall of the renovated classroom of the Russia-Korea Children's Friendship Association Named after Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were officials of the Khabarovsk City Administration, the Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Khabarovsk Territory and media persons, teachers and students of the school and staff members of the DPRK mission in the city.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the ceremony.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Personages of Myanmar, Syria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Personages of Myanmar, Syria
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Personages of Myanmar and Syria issued statements on April 9 and 12 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Aung Thein Lynn, member of the Central Executive Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was a great leader and invincible and iron-willed commander who defeated U.S. and Japanese imperialisms, built the DPRK into a strong socialist fortress and performed undying exploits for the prosperity of the country and global independence.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un, who has creditably carried forward the cause of Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il, is wisely leading the Korean people in their efforts to build a thriving nation and reunify the country.
					
					 The party, army and people of the DPRK will surely achieve victory in showdown with imperialism and build a thriving nation as they are under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Saber Ballul, department head of the Political Faculty of the University of Damascus in Syria, said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was a world-famous political elder who performed great exploits in the history of human thought.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also progressive humankind.
					
					 The U.S. and its lackeys are now staging nuclear war drills against the DPRK, straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme phase.
					
					 The decisive measures taken by the DPRK against their moves are to protect the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation.
					
					 We extend firm solidarity to the service personnel and people of the DPRK courageously standing up against their moves, single-mindedly united around Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Peru
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Peru
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- A national meeting of Peruvian political parties and organizations took place in Lima on April 10. It was sponsored by the Peruvian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Present at the meeting were personages of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students, the Workers' Party, the Communist Party, the Revolutionary Socialist Party, the National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union, the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Suk Library, the Association for the Study of Revolutionary Activities of Comrade Kim Jong Suk, the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute, the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for Study of the Juche Based Songun Policy, the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship and the Peruvian paper Accion Nacionalista Office, and citizens.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador and staff members of his embassy in Lima.
					
					  Tani Baler Lopera, international secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland) who is also the chairman of the Peruvian committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, said Kim Il Sung is always alive in the hearts of humankind.
					
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, praised Kim Il Sung as an iron-willed commander who defeated two imperialisms in one generation and the father of mankind who took all people to his arms with his sunny smile.
					
					 The international secretary of the Central Committee of the Peruvian Communist Party said the Juche idea, Songun idea and Songun politics have been developed as eternal guiding ideas and basic political mode for accomplishing the cause of socialism and the human cause of independence thanks to Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Guillermo Alcazar Ribera, chairperson of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said that the Korean people would surely build a thriving nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The participants watched Korean film "Always in Hearts of Mankind".

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 They included meetings, round-table talks, photo exhibitions and film shows in China, Cuba, Sweden, Ethiopia and Ecuador from April 5 to 9.
					
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos of Kim Il Sung, general secretary Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Korean films shown included "Eternal Treasure in Praise of the Sun".
					
					 The vice-chairperson of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation praised Kim Il Sung as a great man who dedicated all his life to the happiness of the Korean people.
					
					 The chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association said Kim Il Sung beat back U.S. and Japanese imperialisms in one generation and built a true country for people, a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence.
					
					 The chief designer of the general company for metal and machine industry in Ethiopia said preparatory committees were formed in various parts of the world and diverse political and cultural events took place to celebrate the Day of the Sun. This fact proves how ardent humankind's reverence for Kim Il Sung is, he added.
					
					 The chairman of the National Election Council of Ecuador said the DPRK is winning victory after victory in the showdown with the U.S. thanks to the great pluck and firm will of Marshal Kim Jong Un to achieve a final victory by struggling against the latter by its own efforts and in a Korean style. This is ascribable to the might of the service personnel and people of the DPRK single-mindedly united around him, the chairman added.

articles.title: ACNC comenta intento intrigante de fuerzas hostiles
articles.content:
ACNC comenta intento intrigante de fuerzas hostiles
 Pyongyang, 20 de abril (ACNC) -- Recientemente, World Net Daily (Internet), que representa la opinion de las fuerzas conservadoras de Estados Unidos, transmitio la desinformacion de que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea produjo el incidente de explosion de bomba durante la competencia de maraton en Boston por el encargado como "Al Qaeda".
					 Es un intento malsano de las fuerzas hostiles de deshonrar la alta imagen exterior de la RPDC.
					
					 Porque las fuerzas conservadoras de EE.UU., al tildar a la RPDC de "terrorista", intenta alistar otra vez en la lista de "paises de apoyo al terror" y tomar como blanco de la "guerra antiterrorista", al igual que hizo en Irak y Afganistan.  
					
					 Reafirmamos que la RPDC no tiene nada que ver con "Al Qaeda" y mantiene siempre la posicion contra el terrorismo de toda indole tras firmar los acuerdos internacionales por el respecto.
					
					 Si se presenta la necesidad de atacar a EE.UU., la RPDC no se aferrara a tal terror asqueroso.
					
					 Las fuerzas conservadoras norteamericanas deberan sentir verguenza merecida por sus acciones miserables  encaminadas a difamar la imagen de un estado soberano, digno pais con armas nucleares.

articles.title: Linea de desarrollo paralelo garantiza seguridad y prosperidad de nacion, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Linea de desarrollo paralelo garantiza seguridad y prosperidad de nacion, apunta Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, 20 de abril (ACNC) -- La linea estrategica de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares presentada en el pleno de marzo de 2013 del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea es el remedio omnipotente que permite acelerar la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista y la reunificacion de la patria, y es la bandera para defender de generacion en generacion la soberania y la dignidad de la nacion.
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este sabado y continua:
					
					  Esta linea refleja la firme conviccion y la voluntad del Mariscal Kim Jong Un de garantizar la seguridad y la prosperidad de la nacion y construir en el suelo patrio la mejor potencia al fortalecer las fuerzas armadas nucleares de autodefensa.
					
					  Las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC devienen espada de justicia para salvar la nacion desde el cada dia mas abierto chantaje nuclear y amenaza de agresion de Estados Unidos, y escudo confiable que defiende la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la region del Noreste Asiatico y garantiza eternamente la prosperidad de la patria reunificada.
					
					  Igualmente son la vida de la nacion incambiable con nada y patrimonio de la Corea reunificada.
					
					  Nuestras fuerzas armadas nucleares pequenas, ligeras y diversificadas constituyen el disuasivo de guerra capaz de salvar la nacion del desastre nuclear que acarrea EE.UU.
					
					  Puesto que EE.UU. acecha la oportunidad de la guerra de agresion ejerciendo la constante amenaza nuclear a la RPDC, consolidar firmemente en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo las fuerzas armadas nucleares, es la medida muy justa para defender la dignidad y la soberania del pais y la nacion.
					
					  La pasada historia de division nacional y la situacion grave de hoy dada en la Peninsula Coreana demuestran correctamente que con solo las fuerzas armadas nucleares pueden defender la paz y lograr el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad de la nacion.
					
					  Si no hubieramos tenido el disuasivo nuclear poderoso, ya habria estallado la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  La supremacia militar y tecnica no es el objeto monopolizado de los imperialistas y ya paso eternamente la epoca en que los enemigos amenazaban y chantajeaban a la RPDC

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia "estrategia de exterminio al ejercito norcoreano" del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia "estrategia de exterminio al ejercito norcoreano" del Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 20 de abril (ACNC) -- En estos dias, los belicistas titeres surcoreanos presentan la "estrategia de exterminio al ejercito norcoreano" con el ataque preventivo usando los misiles en el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana.
					 El periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este sabado senala que esto prueba claramente que los titeres surcoreanos intentan desatar la guerra con el ataque preventivo de misiles, y continua:
					
					 Los gangsteres de la capa militar surcoreana intentan reflejar su estrategia en el "OPLAN 5015", nuevo guion de guerra de agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y actuan con frenesi para ubicar en la zona al sur de la linea de demarcacion militar los misiles de largo alcance aire-tierra capaces de atacar toda la extension norcoreana.
					
					 El "OPLAN 5015" abarca el "OPLAN 5026", cuyo nucleo es el ataque preventivo nuclear anti-RPDC, y el "OPLAN 5027", cuyo nucleo es desplegar en la Peninsula Coreana las "fuerzas rapidas de disuasivo" de EE.UU., destruir los blancos estrategicos del Norte, hacer desembarcar en la costera de la parte norte enormes efectivos y organizar un "organo de control de ocupacion" despues de ocupar el Norte (de Corea) con las fuerzas y planea ocupar Pyongyang en el corto tiempo con el "ataque preventivo" de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea y el ejercito titere surcoreano sin apoyo del territorio principal de EE.UU.
					
					 Los titeres surcoreanos intentan reflejar en el aventurero "OPLAN 5015" la "estrategia de exterminio al ejercito norcoreano", lo cual es una abierta declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					 Sin prestar oidos a las repetidas advertencias de la RPDC y las fuertes protestas del interior y exterior, los belicistas surcoreanos  presentan la "estrategia de exterminio al ejercito norcoreano", lo que revela plenamente la absurdidad y la naturaleza fraudulenta del rumor de la "amenaza" y la "provocacion" del Norte de que hablan ellos hasta ahora.

articles.title: Tripulantes de barco extranjero conceden mitin por efemeride coreana
articles.content:
Tripulantes de barco extranjero conceden mitin por efemeride coreana
						
 Pyongyang, 20 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 20 en el puerto de Hungnam de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur un mitin de los tripulantes de barco extranjero por el 81o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					 Los participantes depositaron ramos de flores al pie de las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il erguidas en la ciudad de Hamhung y les rindieron el sublime homenaje.
					
					 Asistieron a la ocasion el capitan y los tripulantes del barco de nacionalidad camboyana.
					
					 Los oradores expresaron la mas sublime consideracion al Presidente y al Dirigente, fundador y constructor del EPC y bandera de todas las victorias.
					
					 Destacaron que el EPC ha salido siempre victorioso bajo la sabia direccion de esos grandes hombres del monte Paektu y agregaron que el EPC cuenta con todos los fuertes medios de ataque y defensa capaces de enfrentarse a cualesquier guerras modernas.
					
					 Acotaron que bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, gran comandante insigne del Songun, la RPDC ostenta su dignidad y honor como potencia ideo-politica, la militar y como pais con armas nucleares, fabricador y lanzador de satelites artificiales de talla mundial.
					
					 Solo habra la victoria y gloria ante el camino futuro del pueblo coreano que unido monoliticamente en torno al Mariscal acelera la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista, subrayaron.
					
					 En el mitin fue aprobada una carta al Mariscal.
